casebody.data:
21ST MORTGAGE CORPORATION, Plaintiff-Respondent,
v.
Julius R. SCOTT, Defendant. (Leo Brown-Petitioner) C-942 September Term 2017
080854 Supreme Court of New Jersey. June 15, 2018

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-000445-17 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
